word_list.description: Apply Amida Word List preferences (Amida Style Guide p.5-6)
word_list.found_text: Amida cannot beat branded systems integrators just on the basis of having smart people; we will win with a compelling solution or secret sauce that provides a differentiator (e.g. removing a constraint that has been causing a client to fail such as data issues, cybersec weakness, or measurable ROI). Governance solutions are a greenfield opportunity.
word_list.suggestion: Amida cannot beat branded systems integrators just on the basis of having smart people; we will win with a compelling solution or secret sauce that provides a differentiator (e.g., removing a constraint that has been causing a client to fail such as data issues, cybersec weakness, or measurable ROI). Governance solutions are a greenfield opportunity.

word_list.description: Apply Amida Word List preferences (Amida Style Guide p.5-6)

This solution is part of GDIT's suite of Mission AI offerings and can be customized to meet the unique needs of various agencies. gdit.com

and_or.description: Do not use 'and/or' in formal writing (Amida Style Guide p.6)
and_or.found_text: High value must be measurable impact statement such as reduced cost/increased productivity, accelerated cycle time, process quality gains (reduced errors, customer satisfaction), and/or unique decision insights. While specific AI agents have mission impact measures, NIST (under the President Trump’s AI EO) is newly charged with developing a new metrics environment for scalability and interoperability that will be useful for agentic AI models.
and_or.suggestion: High value must be measurable impact statement such as reduced cost/increased productivity, accelerated cycle time, process quality gains (reduced errors, customer satisfaction), or unique decision insights. While specific AI agents have mission impact measures, NIST (under the President Trump’s AI EO) is newly charged with developing a new metrics environment for scalability and interoperability that will be useful for agentic AI models.

ampersand.found_text: Trusted Agent Huddle & Builder: Creates domain-specific AI copilots for government workflows (benefits, permitting, case management) without backend complexity.
ampersand.suggestion: Trusted Agent Huddle and Builder: Creates domain-specific AI copilots for government workflows (benefits, permitting, case management) without backend complexity.

period_spacing.description: Only one space after period (Amida Style Guide p.5)
period_spacing.found_text: Much like the early days of social media, there is a race to create as many as possible AI agents covering use cases that implement a company or government strategic reform initiatives. The thinking is that AI agents will be orchestrated across worklfows in the near term and Agentic AI will optimize workflows using interconnected AI agents that are continuously being improved manually or by the Agentic AI platform.  One-off AI agents will have little value in the emerging vision called the “Agentic Enterprise”. An Amida AI Platform that includes AI agent creation, on-boarding or integration, and continuing optimization with orchestration and governance will be a winning position with a sustainable Moat.
period_spacing.suggestion: Much like the early days of social media, there is a race to create as many as possible AI agents covering use cases that implement a company or government strategic reform initiatives. The thinking is that AI agents will be orchestrated across worklfows in the near term and Agentic AI will optimize workflows using interconnected AI agents that are continuously being improved manually or by the Agentic AI platform. One-off AI agents will have little value in the emerging vision called the “Agentic Enterprise”. An Amida AI Platform that includes AI agent creation, on-boarding or integration, and continuing optimization with orchestration and governance will be a winning position with a sustainable Moat.

hyphens.description: Use en dashes (–), not em dashes (—) or double hyphens (--) (Amida Style Guide p.5)

hyphens.suggestion: Strengths: Focused approach – bidding on leading edge projects in target states; widely applicable framework for custom agents (auditability, observabliity, compliance, compatibility, enterprise-level) enabling land and expand growth

hyphens.description: Use en dashes (–), not em dashes (—) or double hyphens (--) (Amida Style Guide p.5)

hyphens.suggestion: Accenture Advanced Technology Agent (AATA): Award-winning orchestration platform bridging human and digital systems. Enables open standards, consistent prompt layer, and custom AI agents–scales across fragmented government IT.

positive_language.description: Use positive language to make communication clearer, more constructive, and solution-oriented.
positive_language.found_text: Amida cannot beat branded systems integrators just on the basis of having smart people; we will win with a compelling solution or secret sauce that provides a differentiator (e.g. removing a constraint that has been causing a client to fail such as data issues, cybersec weakness, or measurable ROI).
positive_language.suggestion: Amida can win by offering a compelling solution that addresses a client's specific needs, such as resolving data issues, cybersecurity concerns, or demonstrating measurable ROI.

positive_language.description: Use positive language to make communication clearer, more constructive, and solution-oriented.
positive_language.found_text: Provide secure-by-design AI agents that prevent data loss and unintended or erroneous use
positive_language.suggestion: Amida will develop secure-by-design AI agents that prevent data loss and ensure responsible use.

positive_language.description: Use positive language to make communication clearer, more constructive, and solution-oriented.
positive_language.found_text: Amida achieves 30% gross margin within 24 months.
positive_language.suggestion: Amida achieved 30% gross margin within 24 months.

positive_language.description: Use positive language to make communication clearer, more constructive, and solution-oriented.
positive_language.found_text: Our sales content is vey technical and not consumable for non-IT mission, procurement, or program office staff
positive_language.suggestion: Our sales content is designed to be accessible to non-IT staff, making it consumable for a broader audience.

positive_language.description: Use positive language to make communication clearer, more constructive, and solution-oriented.
positive_language.found_text: Our focus has been on technology versus program impact, so we do not have solutions with mission impact proof points
positive_language.suggestion: Our focus has been on technology, rather than program impact, so we need to develop solutions with demonstrable mission impact.

positive_language.description: Use positive language to make communication clearer, more constructive, and solution-oriented.
positive_language.found_text: Threats/Risks: Low initial spending by clients for new approaches; states have current investments that they don’t want to change; AI may not be suitable for some tasks; limited spending in mid-Atlantic states means we have to find other states to hit target; many companies have workflow builders for common items like email readers; future state market in flux and forecasting of contract vehicles difficult with even leaders saying that they are trying to figure out  how to buy and implement; procurements may be limited by bundling into existing contracts’ scope
positive_language.suggestion: Threats/Risks: Low initial spending by clients for new approaches, combined with existing investments in current systems, may limit our ability to secure new contracts.

positive_language.description: Use positive language to make communication clearer, more constructive, and solution-oriented.
positive_language.found_text: Weaknesses: No unique knowledge outside healthcare and benefits; small client footprint outside mid-Atlantic and none with big 5 IT spending states
positive_language.suggestion: Weaknesses: Amida has limited knowledge outside of healthcare and benefits, and has a small client footprint outside the mid-Atlantic region.

positive_language.description: Use positive language to make communication clearer, more constructive, and solution-oriented.
positive_language.found_text: Weaknesses: our content is vey technical so not consumable for broader market
positive_language.suggestion: Weaknesses: Our content is designed to be easily understood by a broader market.

positive_language.description: Use positive language to make communication clearer, more constructive, and solution-oriented.

positive_language.description: Use positive language to make communication clearer, more constructive, and solution-oriented.
positive_language.found_text: Threats/Risks: clients bundle into existing contracts that we cannot access
positive_language.suggestion: Threats/Risks: Clients often bundle into existing contracts, making it difficult for us to access their potential.

positive_language.description: Use positive language to make communication clearer, more constructive, and solution-oriented.
positive_language.found_text: Weaknesses: lack of dedicated resources; inability to scale and multiple single points of failure (e.g. development, bid and proposal, validation/approval of solution features and functionality)
positive_language.suggestion: Weaknesses: We face challenges with resource allocation, scaling, and managing multiple single points of failure, such as development, bid and proposal, and solution validation.

13.description: Only one space after period (Amida Style Guide p.5)
13.found_text: Much like the early days of social media, there is a race to create as many as possible AI agents covering use cases that implement a company or government strategic reform initiatives. The thinking is that AI agents will be orchestrated across worklfows in the near term and Agentic AI will optimize workflows using interconnected AI agents that are continuously being improved manually or by the Agentic AI platform.  One-off AI agents will have little value in the emerging vision called the “Agentic Enterprise”. An Amida AI Platform that includes AI agent creation, on-boarding or integration, and continuing optimization with orchestration and governance will be a winning position with a sustainable Moat.
13.suggestion: Much like the early days of social media, there is a race to create as many as possible AI agents covering use cases that implement a company or government strategic reform initiatives. The thinking is that AI agents will be orchestrated across worklfows in the near term and Agentic AI will optimize workflows using interconnected AI agents that are continuously being improved manually or by the Agentic AI platform. One-off AI agents will have little value in the emerging vision called the “Agentic Enterprise”. An Amida AI Platform that includes AI agent creation, on-boarding or integration, and continuing optimization with orchestration and governance will be a winning position with a sustainable Moat.
